'''v0.15.10 alpha''' is a minor update to [[Pocket Edition]], [[Gear VR Edition]], and the [[Windows 10 Edition]] Beta released on October 3-4, 2016 to add the [[Campfire Tales Skin Pack]], some [[achievement]]s, and several bug fixes and tweaks.<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/0/http://www.mojang.com/2016/10/eek-the-campfire-tales-skin-pack-creeps-onto-pocket-win-10-today/|title=Eek! Campfire Tales skin pack haunts Pocket / Win 10!|website=[[Mojang.com]]}}</ref>
<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2016/10/fearsome-fixes-the-spooky-01510-changelog-for-pocket-win-10/|title=Fearsome fixes! Changelog 0.15.10 for Pocket / Win 10|website=[[Mojang.com]]}}</ref>

== Additions ==
=== General ===
[[File:Store v0.15.10.png|350px|right|thumb|The version's "[[Marketplace|Store]]" page on the Windows 10 Edition.]]
'''[[Skin pack|Skin packs]]'''
* {{Version exclusive}}: [[Campfire Tales Skin Pack]].
'''[[Achievements]]'''
* Added the following achievements: ''Free Diver'', ''Rabbit Season'', ''Dry Spell'', ''The Deep End'', ''Beaconator'', ''The Beginning?'', ''The Beginning.'', ''Overpowered'', and ''Super Fuel''.

== Changes ==
* Fixed mirror texture issues.
* Small fix to smart turning. (VR only)
* [[Cape]]s no longer clip through [[armor]].

'''Other'''
* When getting the [[MINECON]] 2016 [[cape]]s, the player will now be prompted to make a “free” purchase from their device’s store. If the player is on Android and it prompts them for payment, they can use the code {{cd|MINECON2016}} to get it for free.
* Fixed crash when rendering [[lead]]s in VR. (VR only)
* Using the B button to quit the game (when using a controller) now works. (Win 10 only)
* Fixed top of cursor flickering in VR. (VR only)
* Mouse clicks no longer cause keyboard input to stop. (VR only)
* Fixed issue where Minecraft would not shut down completely when launching another app in the Oculus store. (Win 10 Oculus only)
* Added in bug fixes for VR that were previously in [[Pocket Edition Alpha 0.16.0|0.16]] betas [[Pocket Edition Alpha 0.16.0 build 1|build 1]] and [[Pocket Edition Alpha 0.16.0 build 3|build 3]].
** These bug fixes may include but are not limited to:
*** Fixed a crash upon world load in Gear VR edition.
*** Fixed a connection issue failure with players trying to connect to Realms from Gear VR.
*** Transitioning from Living Room mode to Immersive mode while riding an animal no longer makes the animal look like it's being x-rayed (Win 10 Rift only).
*** Cursor is now fully visible when drawing back a [[bow]] and [[arrow]]s fly according to where the cursor is pointed. (Gear VR edition & Win 10 Rift only)
*** Controller input is now recognized in VR even if the VR window does not have windows focus. (Win 10 Rift only)

== Trivia ==
* Nine of the skins from the Campfire Tales [[skin pack]]: [https://twitter.com/Minecraft/status/781977172659478528 The Headless Haunter], [https://twitter.com/Minecraft/status/782158366529490944 Ol' Diggy], [https://twitter.com/Minecraft/status/782339557941452801 The Sea-Swallowed Captain], [https://twitter.com/Minecraft/status/782520753396801536 Rancid Anne], [https://twitter.com/Minecraft/status/782701948222832640 The Well Wisher], [https://twitter.com/Minecraft/status/782883142046740484 The Sham], [https://twitter.com/Minecraft/status/783064336285704194 Lumbering Jack], [https://twitter.com/Minecraft/status/783245529606160384 Crisp], and [https://twitter.com/Minecraft/status/783426724516270080 The Arisen Rose], in that particular order, were shown in screenshots in various tweets with their backstories captioned alongside them, sent by the official ''Minecraft'' Twitter account.
**These tweets were sent several days before 0.15.10 was released to all devices (except for the Arisen Rose tweet), as a form of 'Teaser', from September 30 to October 4 and were all sent at exactly either 3:01 am or pm.{{more info needed|Timezone?}}
* This is the first update for {{el|pe}} to use a two-digit minor version number.
